session_goals.main_goal: Learn personal pronouns and basic greetings

concepts_learned.notes: Can use all pronouns in simple present tense sentences

errors.description: Word order awkward: verb placed before subject without context

reflection.difficulty: Remembering all pronoun forms, especially 'ŝi' and 'ĝi'
reflection.success: I can now write 5 correct sentences with different pronouns
reflection.strategy: Repeated the pronoun list out loud and wrote each in one sentence
reflection.transfer: Will use these pronouns in the next lesson with verbs in -as
reflection.next_focus: Combine pronouns with present tense verbs

sessions.notes: Good start, small morphology mistakes but quick self-correction
